Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="TriggerID" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="Application" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="TaskType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Device" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="HardwareId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Arguments" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Task %1 canceled servicing of device %3 because: %2.
